rows.label: tlk42450111_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Kokoi has fallen in love with lots
of Drivers in past.

rows.label: tlk42450111_03_msg0003
rows.name: Some Driver have two or three Blade.

rows.label: tlk42450111_03_msg0004
rows.name:
Some Driver even switch between
Blades in battle with expert timing
and keep attack going!

rows.label: tlk42450111_03_msg0005
rows.name:
Some Driver even consider Blade
elements, and use Driver Combo and
Blade Combo, so no chance for enemy!

rows.label: tlk42450111_03_msg0006
rows.name:
So Kokoi just think, if Kokoi marry
Driver like that someday... When start
fighting like all married couple...

rows.label: tlk42450111_03_msg0007
rows.name:
Kokoi be at big disadvantage fighting
against Driver and three Blade!

rows.label: tlk42450111_03_msg0009
rows.name:
Meh-meh?! Kokoi talk so long that lots
customer arrive! Must go back to work!
